Package fr.uge.patchwork

Class SimpleGameData

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.SimpleGameData
public class SimpleGameData extends Object
A class representing the data of the game of Patchwork This class provides all the necessary informations to make the game work
Since:
07/05/2023
Author:
Ilyass BERRADI, Antoine BENOIT
